field.display_name: Enter The Name Of The Shadow Asset
field.note: You can choose the name of your XML feed shadow asset. It can either be a normal string or a combination of string and keywords. For example you can enter 'Result of Query1' or you can enter '%asset_data_source_id%(%asset_short_name%)Result' to have the 'datasourceid(short name of the asset)Result' as the name of your Shadow Asset. Please have a look in the Available Keywords Section and do not forget to enter '%' before and after the keyword or else the keyword will be considered a normal string.

field.display_name: Available Keywords For the Data Source RecordSet Asset
field.note: The above are the available keywords for the XML feed record set asset. You can choose to have one or more keywords or a combination of strings and keywords as the name of the record set assets. Please remember that the keywords have to be preceded and succeeded with a '%' sign or else the keyword will be considered a normal string.
